markdownRemark.html: This is a friendly local support group based in Nueva Andalucia, where parents and carers can meet to compare notes. There are toys for toddlers 0-4 and an opportunity for the little ones to socialize and make friends. Moms and carers can have a coffee and a chat.

frontmatter.title: Bouncers mother, baby & toddler group
frontmatter.description: Bouncers mother, baby & toddler group - This is a friendly local support group based in Nueva Andalucia, where parents and carers can meet to compare notes. There are toys for toddlers 0-4 and an opportunity for the little ones to socialize and make friends. Moms and carers can have a coffee and a chat.
frontmatter.hours: Every Wednesday morning from 10h30 to 12h30 during term time.
frontmatter.address: El Jardin (in the room upstairs) Aloha Gardens, Nueva Andalucia
